version.description:
The Unicode Consortium accepted the following emoji 72 emojis for Unicode 9.0. This update was released on June 21, 2016. Most vendors added support for this update within the 2016 calendar year. Sample images and more about Unicode 9.0.

Emoji 4.0 was published in late 2016, which added additional emoji professions.

New in Unicode 9

emoji_net_data.category: Supplemental Symbols And Pictographs -> Miscellaneous mark
emoji_net_data.definition: A padded boxing glove, used in the sport ofÂ boxing. Usually red. Boxing Glove was approved as part of Unicode 9.0 in 2016 and added to Emoji http://emojipedia.org/boxing-glove/
emoji_net_data.name: boxing glove

bn:13756348v: To catch the ball in a baseball mitt

bn:00012564n: Boxing gloves are cushioned gloves that fighters wear on their hands during boxing matches.
Boxing equipment consisting of big and padded coverings for the fists of the fighters; worn for the sport of boxing
A padded mitten, designed to protect the hand while punching, and worn in boxing.

bn:00012560n: Bare-knuckled boxing, a form of boxing done without boxing gloves or similar padding.
A combat sport in which two participants of similar weight fight each other with their fists.
Bare-knuckle boxing is the original form of boxing, closely related to ancient combat sports.
A sport where two opponents punch each other with gloved fists, the object being to score more points by the end of the match or by knockout, or technical knockout.
Boxing is a combat sport in which two people engage in a contest of strength, speed, reflexes, endurance, and will, by throwing punches at each other, usually with gloved hands.

bn:00040736n: A garment covering the whole hand
A glove is a garment covering the whole hand.
Handwear: covers the hand and wrist
A garment for a hand, often extending to the wrist and sometimes up to the elbow, which either covers each finger individually, or separates the thumb from the other fingers.
An item of clothing other than a mitten, covering all or part of the hand and fingers, but allowing independent movement of the fingers

apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the boxing glove emoji is depicted with a bold, dynamic stance, featuring a richly colored glove with a strong sense of texture and volume, thanks to Appleâ€™s signature 3D shading and realistic lighting. Its soft rounded edges give it a tactile feel, while the subtle highlights suggest a well-worn, powerful tool of sport. This emoji powerfully symbolizes competition, strength, resilience, or the act of fighting for a cause, often used to express determination or a spirited challenge.
